ygData.subject: Re: spell changes
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/25/99 7:38:27 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... One of the goals you must put forth for yourself is to add one friend at a time that is
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/25/99 7:38:27 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
scan@... writes:

> Good groups are hard to find. I don't mind if I level slower because I
> have to sit and rest more than I would in a group or because I can only
> take blues instead of yellows or reds. But I did very much mind losing 1/2
> bubble or more everytime I died.
>
> I understand that the game is suppossed to be challenging and is meant to
> be geared for people to work together. But sometimes, I would prefer to
> work alone and I don't think I should be penalized for it.
>
> Anya
> High Elf Magician
> Rallos Zek

One of the goals you must put forth for yourself is to add one friend at a
time that is competent in battle. Just like adding nice items to a
collection. Do not tell me it is unfair you must do so, because the same
argument applies to everything else. Do you intend to wear cloth armor and
use non magical items for your entire career? No, add nicer things a piece
at a time.

Kalleon Valkyrre
Karana
